item.title: Help!@!@
item.dc:creator: @stikfigure stikfigure
item.description:
@stikfigure wrote:

Um. That doesn’t make any sense. Im confused on what you mean.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 06:18:40 PM[/size][hr]Heres some other code I have for iron rocks… I can’t figure this out though. Seriously confusing me.

case 2092: if (actionTimer == 0) { if (playerLevel[14] >= 99) addSkillXP((150 * playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("You being to swing your axe at the rock!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 10; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (playerLevel[14] <= 99){ sendMessage("You need a Mining level of 99 to mine this rock.");

item.title: Help!@!@
item.dc:creator: @stikfigure stikfigure
item.description:
@stikfigure wrote:

My server source has a GEM rock already added. It doesn’t require a level to mine it and I would like it to. I just don’t know how to make it require a level.

Here’s what I got.

case 2111: if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((280 * playerLevel[14]), 14); sendMessage("You start to mine the rock!"); setAnimation(624); actionTimer = 6; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

What do I have to do to make it require a certain level?

Read full topic
